attributes.action: Coronavirus-Free up car parking spaces in hospital carparks, for NHS staff only.
attributes.additional_details:
At the current time, more than ever, we need to look after the people that look after us. 
This would be a fantastic, helpful incentive.
attributes.background:
Doctors and nurses, should not be made to park a long distance away from the hospital doors. They work very long hard working shifts, so should be able to leave work and jump straight into their cars to go home. 
Hospital carparks, should only be used for Doctors and Nurses during this pandemic.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government have announced that they will provide free car parking for all NHS and social care staff. You can read more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-to-provide-free-car-parking-for-nhs-and-social-care-staff

Decisions on who can park in an NHS Car Park or creating staff-only parking would be a matter for individual NHS Trusts. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
